review: I will add to the folks that had a terrible out of box experience.  After setup and updates it gives the "We Are Unable to Contact Our Servers" message, despite strong wifi signals AND the device is able to send me email (photo links)  It is NOT a network problem and all my account features work from a browser.  There are posts online about this issue but no resolution or response from Amazon.Also it wants to bill me in UK currency?!?!  2 hours of my Sunday morning wasted.

review: To be able to watch anything recent or worthwhile one has to be a member of Amazon Prime which is a $100 committment. If the tech geek had explained that to me I probably would not have bought the device. I bought a couple as presents but will definitely explain to the recipients of this device the complete deal before they begin to try to use it. On a good note it was easy to install and start using.
